net.sf.jasperreports.engine

Interface ImageMapRenderable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JRImageMapRenderer, JRRenderable, Renderable, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BatikRenderer, DrawChartRenderer, JRSimpleImageMapRenderer, WrappingImageMapRenderable

    public interface ImageMapRenderable
extends Renderable, JRImageMapRenderer
    Image renderer able to produce image maps.
    Version:
    $Id: ImageMapRenderable.java 5878 2013-01-07 20:23:13Z teodord $
    Author:
    Teodor Danciu (teodord@users.sourceforge.net)
